its more of the previous game with a number of game play enhancements but unfortunately its let down by four things  there is no auto next so you are going to be spending a lot of time pressing next or skip dialogue  theres no way to turn off the notification spam  you cant disable the cinematics that play inbetween the menu transitions  the chapters dont reveal all items at once so you have to start every single cinematic to get to the next mission
